item.description:
1. Is Palworld a “dead game”? Who cares, says the game’s developer  Ars Technica
  2. Palworld's community manager says our 'dead game' fixation is ruining gaming: 'I don't think it really serves anyone to push gamers to play the same game, day in and day out'  PC Gamer
  3. Palworld dev says "you won't regret" playing more indies instead of "the latest battlepass in your favorite AAA game"  Gamesradar
  4. Playing The Same Game Forever Is Unhealthy For Everyone, Says Palworld Dev  GameSpot
  5. Palworld developer says playing the same game all the time is ‘not healthy’ for players or the industry  Video Games Chronicle

item.title: Star Wars Outlaws Has A Great Option Every Game Should Offer - Kotaku
item.description:
1. Star Wars Outlaws Has A Great Option Every Game Should Offer  Kotaku
  2. Star Wars Outlaws sidesteps Resident Evil 4 Remake and Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth's yellow paint discourse by making it optional  Gamesradar
  3. Star Wars Outlaws Lets Players Turn Off Yellow Paint via ‘Explorer Mode’  IGN
  4. Star Wars Outlaws will let us recreate the look of the movies  Yahoo! Voices
  5. Star Wars Outlaws features an accessibility mode aimed at people afflicted by the most debilitating phobia in gaming, a fear of slightly annoying hints  VG247

item.title: A Decade On, The Elder Scrolls Online Is Now a Brilliant Destination for Skyrim and Oblivion Fans - IGN
item.description: A Decade On, The Elder Scrolls Online Is Now a Brilliant Destination for Skyrim and Oblivion Fans  IGN

item.title: Unreal Engine 5 Continues to Prove Extremely Demanding on Consoles With Marvel Rivals; Xbox Series S Resolution Drops as Low as 540p - Wccftech
item.description:
1. Unreal Engine 5 Continues to Prove Extremely Demanding on Consoles With Marvel Rivals; Xbox Series S Resolution Drops as Low as 540p  Wccftech
  2. "They need to fix it": Marvel Rivals' adorable new comic book character is undeniably cute, but he's also "terrible for game health and balancing"  Gamesradar
  3. Marvel Rivals Feels Like Overwatch Without All The Baggage  Kotaku
  4. Marvel Rivals' closed beta is aggressively bad and turns my favourite Marvel villain into a glorified babysitter  PC Gamer
  5. MARVEL RIVALS Shares New Cinematic Story Trailer; Adds Thor And Jeff The Land Shark  CBM (Comic Book Movie)
